snippet: A look back at the term just concluded reveals that the court, which has had a reputation for predictable ideological splits, has entered a new phase.
abstract: Review of the Supreme Court's most recent term indicates that the court, associated with predictable ideological splits, has entered a new phase; court has worked with striking unanimity and assertiveness to review the actions of other branches of government, developing an adversarial relationship with the Obama administration; decisions also indicate that Chief Justice John G Roberts has worked hard to insulate the court from charges of political motivation.
lead_paragraph: A look back at the term just concluded reveals that the court, which has had a reputation for predictable ideological splits, has entered a new phase.

headline.seo: Supreme Court’s Recent Term, a New Phase
headline.main: In Supreme Court Term, Striking Unity on Major Cases
headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Moving Beyond Its Old Divides
